aka: アラン・カーの冒険 アガサ・クリスティーの世界
this_title: Alan Carr's Adventures with Agatha Christie Season 1
trans_title: アラン・カーの冒険 アガサ・クリスティーの世界
introduction: Comedian Alan Carr embarks on a journey across the UK in search of the places which inspired beloved British crime-writer Agatha Christie. Alan developed his own love of Christie’s novels when he was growing up in Northampton in the 1980s, escaping into the genteel world of super-sleuths Hercule Poirot and Miss Jane Marple. Alan visits Burgh Island in South Devon, Agatha Christie’s holiday home Greenway House, and he also goes backstage at long-running play `The Mousetrap’ in London’s West End.S1 E1 AgathaS1 E2 Miss MarpleS1 E3 Hercule PoirotProduction companies: Boom Cymru, Channel 4 TelevisionProducers: Jenny Dafydd, Ryan Daly, Sam Grace, Lindsey Hammond, Nicky Illis, Kate Thomas
chinese_title: Alan Carr's Adventures with Agatha Christie Season 1
